https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/CUq57fBZPBawuPzQuKfjCGaBVa.jpg John Woo's "The Killer" meets Shakespeare's MacBeth in this gun barrel, hip-hop drama seen through African eyes. "Bloody Streetz" is the story of what happens when a ruthless killer for hire runs up against an African spirit and is forced to learn the errors of his ways. Bloody Streetz
